name: Let's (not) Leaf
description:
A small and relaxing game about playing around and planting some sunflowers. The game isn't finished by far, but we hope you'll enjoy it.

Let's (not) Leaf was made by Hallvard Sæle & Torgeir Bull with music by Erlend Moen. 

The game was part of our first Game Jam, the 2D Spring Jam 2021.

PS: The ants got physics! Drag'em around!
